QA/QC InspectorSpecial Requirements: Must have ISO certification in Quality Control
inspection of buildings and facilities in civil, and/or mechanical, and/or electrical engineering disciplines.
building inspector certificate or license from an approved institution in the candidate’s home country would be beneficial
to follow proper inspection techniques and examine workmanship and materials, to detect deviations from codes, specifications and approved construction and maintenance practices.Skills
Skills:
Associate Degree or Diploma in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical or equivalent from a fully accredited and reputed University, having building inspector certificate or license from an approved institution in the candidate’s home country would be beneficial
Shall have 7 years’ experience as site supervisor or inspector in related field.  
Must have experience in the inspection of buildings and facilities in civil, and/or mechanical, and/or electrical engineering disciplines.
Must have knowledge of and be able to interpret IBC and other international building, mechanical and electrical [NEC] codes, and.
Must be able to follow proper inspection techniques and examine workmanship and materials, to detect deviations from codes, specifications and approved construction and maintenance practices.
Must also have experience in planning and scheduling.
